languages.text: {n}Соломон чуть наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, когда пресытитесь разговором с губернатором, позвольте мне задать ему несколько вопросов".

traits.locale_text: "Какая невероятная история. Жаль, слишком утопичная. Постарайтесь лгать убедительнее, губернатор".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон чуть наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, когда пресытитесь разговором с губернатором, позвольте мне задать ему несколько вопросов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you. {/n} "Rogue Trader, after you've had enough of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."
{n}Solomorne leans over to you. {/n} "Rogue Trader, after you've had enough of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

{n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."
{n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙朝你侧过了身子。{/n}“行商浪人，等你和总督谈得差不多了，我想问他几个问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙朝你侧过了身子。{/n}“行商浪人，等你和总督谈得差不多了，我想问他几个问题。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se inclina hacia ti:{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, cuando haya terminado con el gobernador, me gustaría hacerle algunas preguntas».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se inclina hacia ti:{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, cuando haya terminado con el gobernador, me gustaría hacerle algunas preguntas».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, Vali Bey ile işiniz bitince müsaadenizle ona birkaç soru sormak isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, Vali Bey ile işiniz bitince müsaadenizle ona birkaç soru sormak isterim."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、あなたに近づく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、総督にうんざりしたら、私から彼にいくつか質問させてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、あなたに近づく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、総督にうんざりしたら、私から彼にいくつか質問させてください」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se penche vers vous :{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, lorsque vous estimerez avoir assez discuté avec le gouverneur, laissez-moi lui poser quelques questions. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se penche vers vous :{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, lorsque vous estimerez avoir assez discuté avec le gouverneur, laissez-moi lui poser quelques questions. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich zu dir.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wenn Ihr vom Gouverneur genug habt, lasst mich ihm einige Fragen stellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne leans over to you:{/n} "Rogue Trader, once you've had your fill of the governor, let me ask him a few questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich zu dir."{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wenn Ihr vom Gouverneur genug habt, lasst mich ihm einige Fragen stellen."
